module.name: oop_base_object
module.note: This is a generated file, do not edit directly.

macro.name: boGetIf
macro.brief: Returns a pointer to one of the implemented interfaces.
macro.note: The interface pointer is returned as a <tt>void *</tt> in order to be directly usable as any of the interface's ancestors pointers.
macro.return: A void pointer to the interface within the class instance.

class.name: base_object
class.details: This abstract class is the common ancestor of all classes used in ChibiOS. This class just defines the position of the VMT pointer inside the structure.
